amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 119-38 to amend the definition of 'foreign entity of concern' to include Chinese military companies identified on the list required by section 1260H of the FY 2021 NDAA (colloquially referred to as the "Section 1260H list").

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
